message: Let's be fair. I'll take the lion's share this time, but I'm sure you'll get your chance in the next round.
You got a good chunk last round, now it's my turn to get a fair share.
Let's compromise. I'll take slightly less this time, and you'll get more, so we can both get a good share before inflation eats away at our gains.
I'm not budging, I need a bigger share to keep up with inflation!
It's clear we're both feeling the pinch of inflation. Let's split the difference and call it a day. We can both walk away with a decent share.
